Name: Geography Quiz Festival: Guess the countries and flags!
About the game: Welcome to Geography Quiz Festival! Advance through our beloved game by completing the different missions you find on your way. Prove that you know the most about Geography! You are trapped in an unknown place. If you want to go back to your world, you will have to overcome the creatures challenges. Will you be able to solve all the quizzes on the first try? More than 200 quizzes available to guess in 20 exciting levels. Exercise your mind with Geography Quiz Festival! The most addictive game ever created that has already conquered millions of people. All countries and flags of the world. 20 different levels! Different levels of difficulty of the quizzes! Continuous updates and expansions of the game - the adventure always goes on! Donâ€™t miss any of the updates!
